alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:04PM CDT until April 14 at 3:06PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Watts. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to near Fidler`s Bend. Extreme turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 14.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
